targets.expr:
(
  sum by (function_name) (
    increase(function_duration_seconds_sum{job="$job", instance=~"$instance(:\\d+)?$", namespace!~"rpc|engine", function_name!~"Block execution|Execute Block|Trie update"}[$__range])
  )
)
or
label_replace(
  sum( increase(function_duration_seconds_sum{job="$job", instance=~"$instance(:\\d+)?$", namespace!~"rpc|engine", function_name="Block execution"}[$__range]) )
  - sum( increase(function_duration_seconds_sum{job="$job", instance=~"$instance(:\\d+)?$", namespace!~"rpc|engine", function_name=~"Storage read|Account read|Account code read|Block hash read"}[$__range]) ),
  "function_name","Block Execution (w/o reads)","__name__",".*"
)
or
label_replace(
  sum( increase(function_duration_seconds_sum{job="$job", instance=~"$instance(:\\d+)?$", namespace!~"rpc|engine", function_name="Execute Block"}[$__range]) )
  - sum( increase(function_duration_seconds_sum{job="$job", instance=~"$instance(:\\d+)?$", namespace!~"rpc|engine", function_name="Block execution"}[$__range]) ),
  "function_name","Merkleization Diff","__name__",".*"
)

panels.description: This panel shows the difference between the Execution vs merkleization in the `execute_block_pipeline` function. It's shown as a percentage of the whole function. If it's negative, execution took more time than merkleization.

targets.expr:
label_replace(
  (sum( increase(function_duration_seconds_sum{job="$job", instance=~"$instance(:\\d+)?$", namespace!~"rpc|engine", function_name="Trie update"}[$__range]) )
  - sum( increase(function_duration_seconds_sum{job="$job", instance=~"$instance(:\\d+)?$", namespace!~"rpc|engine", function_name="Block execution"}[$__range]) ))
  / sum( increase(function_duration_seconds_sum{job="$job", instance=~"$instance(:\\d+)?$", namespace!~"rpc|engine", function_name="Execute Block"}[$__range]) ),
  "function_name","Execution vs Merkleization Diff %","__name__",".*"
)

label_replace(
    1 - ( sum( increase(function_duration_seconds_sum{job="$job", instance=~"$instance(:\\d+)?$", namespace!~"rpc|engine", function_name="Trie update"}[$__range]) )
    / sum( increase(function_duration_seconds_sum{job="$job", instance=~"$instance(:\\d+)?$", namespace!~"rpc|engine", function_name="Execute Block"}[$__range]) )),
  "function_name","Merkleization vs Total diff","__name__",".*"
)

panels.title: Execution vs Merkleization Diff % - $instance

panels.description: This Panel shows the deaggregated measures of the current instrumentation we have for block processing tied by block.
panels.title: Block Execution Deaggregated by Block - $instance

panels.description: Total time spent per method for all RPC endpoints
panels.title: Engine Total Time per Method - $instance

targets.expr:
sum by (method) (increase(rpc_request_duration_seconds_sum{job="$job", instance=~"$instance(:\\d+)?$", namespace="engine"}[$__range])) 
/ sum by (method) (increase(rpc_request_duration_seconds_count{job="$job", instance=~"$instance(:\\d+)?$", namespace="engine"}[$__range]))

sum by (method) (increase(rpc_request_duration_seconds_sum{job="$job", instance=~"$instance(:\\d+)?$", namespace="engine"}[18s])) 
/ sum by (method) (increase(rpc_request_duration_seconds_count{job="$job", instance=~"$instance(:\\d+)?$", namespace="engine"}[18s]))

panels.description: Total time spent per method for all RPC endpoints
panels.title: RPC Total Time per Method - $instance

targets.expr:
sum by (method) (increase(rpc_request_duration_seconds_sum{job="$job", instance=~"$instance(:\\d+)?$", namespace="rpc"}[18s])) 
/ sum by (method) (increase(rpc_request_duration_seconds_count{job="$job", instance=~"$instance(:\\d+)?$", namespace="rpc"}[18s]))

panels.description:
This shows error % by kind in the total requests for a particular method, ie:
- 50 request to method_a
- 5 internal errors on method_a
- 12 timeout errors on method_a

Result:
- 10% of method_a - % of internal error
- 24% of method_a - % of timeout error
panels.title: Engine & RPC Errors % by Method & Kind - $instance

panels.description: This calculates the size in bytes of the datadir path where the DB is stored.
panels.title: Datadir Size

panels.description: This calculates the average numbers of cores used by the ethrex node during the last minute.
panels.title: Node CPU (avg. cores used)

panels.description: This calculates the RSS memory for the ethrex node.
panels.title: Node Memory (RSS)

panels.description: This is the CPU utilization % of the host machine where the node is running. This was extracted from node_exporter.
panels.title: Host CPU Utilization (%)

panels.description: This is the RAM (used vs Total) of the host machine where the node is running. This was extracted from node_exporter and converted from bytes to GiB
